[[Category:Arma_3:_New_Scripting_Commands_List|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 23, 2020 - 10:29 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:R3vo|R3vo]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
To continuously make all created objects editable for all Zeus use the following code:
<ext><name>syntaxhighlight</name><attr> lang="cpp"</attr><inner>
if (isServer) then
{
    [] spawn
    {
        while {true} do
        {
            {
                    _x addCuratorEditableObjects
                    [
                        entities [[],['Logic'],true],
                        true, //Include vehicle crew
                        true  //Exclude dead bodies
                    ];
            } count allCurators;
            sleep 60; //Change to whatever fits your needs
        };
    };
};</inner><close></syntaxhighlight></close></ext>
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
